column1: Kata Robata////LOVED Kata Robata! First time experience there last Saturday night. My boyfriend and I went for a late dinner and had not made a reservation prior. We enjoyed drinks at the bar which delivered fabulous service. Sat down at a table about 45 minutes later to order dinner. For an appetizer
column2: the Hamachi and Jalapeno Sashimi was recommended by our waiter and was PERFECT. We had the Texas Hamachi roll and a Sashimi dish for entrees. You cannot go wrong ordering from here
column3: it was a perfect night out and will definitely be returning :)
